int getAutoTextureResolution(MFnDependencyNode& node) {
        MStatus res;
        int textureResolution;
        std::wstring script = L"beastUtils.getAutomaticTextureResolution('" + std::wstring(node.name().asWChar()) + L"')";
        res = MGlobal::executePythonCommand(script.c_str(), textureResolution);
        return res == MStatus::kSuccess?textureResolution:0;
}

void getTextureResolution(MFnDependencyNode& node, int2& textureResolution) {
        bool autoTextureResolution = false;
        getPlugValue(node, L"autoTextureResolution", autoTextureResolution);
        if(autoTextureResolution) {
                int calculatedTextureResolution = getAutoTextureResolution(node);
                textureResolution[0] = textureResolution[1] = calculatedTextureResolution;
        } else {
                getCompoundPlugValue(node, L"textureResolution", textureResolution);
        }
}

void getLiveTextureResolution(MFnDependencyNode& transformNode, int2& textureResolution) {
        MStatus res;
        MObject defaultEntity = getLiveEntityNode(transformNode);

        bool fromInstance = true;
        getPlugValue(defaultEntity, L"fromInstance", fromInstance);

        MObject targetObj = getLiveBeastTarget(transformNode);
        MFnDependencyNode target(targetObj, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        bool atlas = false;
        getPlugValue(target, L"atlasTarget", atlas);

        if(fromInstance) {
                MFnDependencyNode instanceNode(getBeastInstanceNode(transformNode), &res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                getTextureResolution(instanceNode, textureResolution);
        } else {
                MFnDependencyNode entityNode(defaultEntity, &res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);
                getTextureResolution(entityNode, textureResolution);
        }

        if(atlas) {
                int2 targetTextureResolution = {512, 512};
                getCompoundPlugValue(target, L"textureResolution", targetTextureResolution);

                // Clamp instance texture resolution to target resolution
                textureResolution[0] = std::min(textureResolution[0], targetTextureResolution[0]);
                textureResolution[1] = std::min(textureResolution[1], targetTextureResolution[1]);
        }
}

void setLightFalloff(MFnNonExtendedLight& light, BeastLightPtr& beastLight) {

        short falloffType = 0;
        float range = FLT_MAX, exponent = 0.0f;
        float constant = 1.0f, linear = 0.0f, quadratic = 0.0f;
        bool clamp = true;

        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffType", falloffType);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffRange", range);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffExponent", exponent);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffClamp", clamp);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffConstant", constant);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffLinear", linear);
        getPlugValue(light, L"beastFalloffQuadratic", quadratic);

        switch (falloffType) {
        case 1:
                {       // Exponent
                        beastLight->setExponentFalloff(range, exponent, clamp);
                        break;
                }
        case 2:
                {       // Max Range
                        beastLight->setMaxRangeFalloff(range, exponent);
                        break;
                }
        case 3:
                {       // Polynomial
                        beastLight->setPolynomialFalloff(range, constant, linear, quadratic, clamp);
                        break;
                }
        default:
                {       // Use the Maya style, think this is pretty close.
                        beastLight->setExponentFalloff(FLT_MAX, light.decayRate(), true);
                        break;
                }
        }
}

MObject getLiveEntityNode(MFnDependencyNode& instance) {
        MStatus res;
        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> beastInstanceResultPair = getConnectedNode(instance, L"beastInstance");
        if(beastInstanceResultPair.first == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MObject::kNullObj;
        }
        MObject beastInstance = beastInstanceResultPair.first;
        MFnDependencyNode beastInstanceNode(beastInstance, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, MObject::kNullObj);

        MString liveTarget;
        getPlugValue(beastInstanceNode, L"liveTarget", liveTarget);

        std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> > connectedNodes;
        MPlug entitiesPlug = instance.findPlug(L"beastEntities", true);
        getConnectedNodes(entitiesPlug, connectedNodes);

        MObject defaultEntity = MObject::kNullObj;

        for(auto it = begin(connectedNodes); it != end(connectedNodes); ++it) {
                MObject entityObj = (*it).first;
                MFnDependencyNode entityNode(entityObj);

                if(entityNode.typeId() != ADSK_BEAST_ENTITY) {
                        // This could probably also be worth an assert, but since Maya allows you to connect whatever...
                        continue;
                }
                // Return default entity if no liveTarget is set
                if(liveTarget.length() == 0) {
                        return entityObj;
                }

                MString entityTarget;
                getPlugValue(entityNode, L"target", entityTarget);
                if(liveTarget == entityTarget) {
                        // This matches the selected target on the Beast instance
                        return entityObj;
                }

                if(defaultEntity == MObject::kNullObj) {
                        defaultEntity = entityObj;
                }
        }
        return defaultEntity;
}

MObject getBeastInstanceNode(MFnDependencyNode& instance) {
        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> result;
        result = getConnectedNode(instance, L"beastInstance");
        return result.first;
}

MObject getBeastTarget(MString& uniqueID) {
        // Iterate through all target nodes
        MItDependencyNodes it(MFn::kPluginDependNode);
        MString targetID = L"";
        while (!it.isDone()) {
                MFnDependencyNode targetNode(it.thisNode());
                if (targetNode.typeId() == ADSK_BEAST_TARGET) {
                        getPlugValue(targetNode, L"uniqueID", targetID);
                        if(uniqueID == targetID) {
                                return targetNode.object();
                        }
                }
                it.next();
        }
        return MObject::kNullObj;
}

MObject getLiveBeastTarget(MFnDependencyNode& instance) {
        MObject defaultEntity = getLiveEntityNode(instance);
        // It's ok to be null because there may not be any entities
        if(defaultEntity == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MObject::kNullObj;
        }

        // Get default entity ID
        MString defaultEntityUniqueID;
        getPlugValue(defaultEntity, L"target", defaultEntityUniqueID);

        MObject defaultTarget = getBeastTarget(defaultEntityUniqueID);
        // It's not ok to not have a matching target
        assert(defaultTarget != MObject::kNullObj && "No target with specified ID");
        return defaultTarget;
}


bool isFile(std::wstring const &path) {
        MStatus res = MGlobal::executePythonCommand(L"import os");
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, false);

        std::wstring escapedPath;
        for (std::size_t i = 0; i < path.size(); ++i) {
                if (path[i] == L'/') {
                        escapedPath.push_back('/');
                }
                escapedPath.push_back(path[i]);
        }

        int result = 0;
        std::wstring script = L"int(os.path.isfile('" + escapedPath + L"'))";
        res = MGlobal::executePythonCommand(script.c_str(), result);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        return res == MStatus::kSuccess && result != 0;
}

std::wstring getLightMapUVSet(const MFnDagNode& instance) {
        MStatus res;
        MDagPath path;
        instance.getPath(path);
        res = path.extendToShape();
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, L"");
        MFnMesh mesh(path, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(res, L"");
        MStringArray uvSetNames;
        mesh.getUVSetNames(uvSetNames);

        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < uvSetNames.length(); i++) {
                std::wstring lcaseUVName = uvSetNames[i].asWChar();
                std::transform(lcaseUVName.begin(), lcaseUVName.end(), lcaseUVName.begin(), tolower);
                if (std::wstring::npos != lcaseUVName.find(L"light")){
                        // Found something that is probably a lightmap uv-set so let's use it.
                        return uvSetNames[i].asWChar();
                }
        }
        return uvSetNames[0].asWChar();
}


std::wstring getBakeUVSet(const MObject& beastEntity, const MObject& beastInstance, const MObject& beastTarget, const MFnDagNode& instance)
{
        bool fromInstance = true;
        if(beastEntity != MObject::kNullObj) {
                getPlugValue(beastEntity, L"fromInstance", fromInstance);
        }

        MString bakeUVSet;
        if(beastEntity != MObject::kNullObj && !fromInstance) {
                getPlugValue(beastEntity, L"bakeUVSet", bakeUVSet);
                if(bakeUVSet.length() > 0) {
                        return bakeUVSet.asWChar();
                }
        }
        if(beastInstance != MObject::kNullObj) {
                getPlugValue(beastInstance, L"bakeUVSet", bakeUVSet);
                if(bakeUVSet.length() > 0) {
                        return bakeUVSet.asWChar();
                }
        }
        if(beastTarget != MObject::kNullObj) {
                getPlugValue(beastTarget, L"bakeUVSet", bakeUVSet);
                if(bakeUVSet.length() > 0) {
                        return bakeUVSet.asWChar();
                }
        }
        return getLightMapUVSet(instance);
}

void getEntityNodes(MFnDependencyNode& instance, std::vector<MObject>& result) {
        MStatus res;
        MPlug entities = instance.findPlug(L"beastEntities", &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>> connectedNodes;
        getConnectedNodes(entities, connectedNodes);

        for(auto it = begin(connectedNodes); it != end(connectedNodes); ++it) {
                MFnDependencyNode entityNode((*it).first);
                if(entityNode.typeId() == ADSK_BEAST_ENTITY) {
                        result.push_back(entityNode.object());
                }
        }
}

MStatus createUVSet(MFnDependencyNode& entity) {
        std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> mayaInstancePair = getConnectedNode(entity, L"instance");
        if(mayaInstancePair.first == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }
        MObject& mayaInstance = mayaInstancePair.first;
        if(!mayaInstance.hasFn(MFn::kDagNode)) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }
        MStatus res;
        MFnDagNode dagNode(mayaInstance, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        MDagPath path;
        dagNode.getPath(path);
        res = path.extendToShape();
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        MFnMesh mesh(path, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        MStringArray uvSetNames;
        mesh.getUVSetNames(uvSetNames);

        MString uniqueID;
        getPlugValue(entity, L"target", uniqueID);
        MObject target = getBeastTarget(uniqueID);
        if(target == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }

        MFnDependencyNode targetNode(target, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        int targetType = 0;
        getPlugValue(targetNode, L"targetType", targetType);
        if(targetType == TARGET_TYPE_VERTEXBAKE) {
                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        MUintArray instanceNumberArray;
        res = instanceNumberArray.append(path.instanceNumber());
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        MString uvSetName = targetNode.name();
        uvSetName += L"_";
        uvSetName += uniqueID;

        MString uniqueIDAndInstanceNbr = uniqueID;
        uniqueIDAndInstanceNbr += L"(";
        uniqueIDAndInstanceNbr += path.instanceNumber();
        uniqueIDAndInstanceNbr += L")";

        bool beastUVSetExists = false;
        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < uvSetNames.length(); ++i) {
                std::wstring currentUVSetName = uvSetNames[i].asWChar();
                if (currentUVSetName.find(uniqueIDAndInstanceNbr.asWChar()) != std::wstring::npos){
                        beastUVSetExists = true;
                        break;
                }
        }
        if(!beastUVSetExists) {
                res = mesh.createUVSet(uvSetName, 0, &instanceNumberArray);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        } else {
                uvSetName += L"(";
                uvSetName += path.instanceNumber();
                uvSetName += L")";
        }

        MString lightMapUVSetName = getLightMapUVSet(mayaInstance).c_str();
        if(lightMapUVSetName.length() == 0) {
                return MStatus::kFailure;
        }

        MIntArray uvCounts;
        MIntArray uvIds;
        res = mesh.getAssignedUVs(uvCounts, uvIds, &lightMapUVSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        float2 atlasScale = {1.0f, 1.0f};
        float2 atlasOffset = {0.0f, 0.0f};
        getCompoundPlugValue(entity, L"outAtlasScale", atlasScale);
        getCompoundPlugValue(entity, L"outAtlasOffset", atlasOffset);

        MFloatArray u;
        MFloatArray v;
        res = mesh.getUVs(u, v, &lightMapUVSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        for(unsigned int i = 0; i < u.length(); ++i) {
                const float newU = u[i] * atlasScale[0] + atlasOffset[0];
                const float newV = v[i] * atlasScale[1] + atlasOffset[1];
                res = u.set(newU, i);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
                res = v.set(newV, i);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        }

        res = mesh.setCurrentUVSetName(uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = mesh.setUVs(u, v, &uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = mesh.assignUVs(uvCounts, uvIds, &uvSetName);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        return MStatus::kSuccess;
}

void updateCameraSettings(BeastCameraPtr& beastCamera, MObject& camObject, MObject& beastSettingsObject) {
        MStatus cameraRes;
        MFnCamera camera(camObject, &cameraRes);
        if(cameraRes != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                return;
        }

        int2 liveViewResolution = {640, 480}; 
        double horizontalFOV, verticalFOV;
        getCompoundPlugValue(beastSettingsObject, L"liveViewRes", liveViewResolution);
        camera.getPortFieldOfView(liveViewResolution[0], liveViewResolution[1], horizontalFOV, verticalFOV);
        beastCamera->setFov(float(horizontalFOV), 1.0f);
        beastCamera->setVerticalFov(float(verticalFOV));
        float scale = 1.0f;
        getPlugValue(camera,L"focusRegionScale", scale);
        bool enableDof = camera.isDepthOfField();
        if (enableDof) {
                beastCamera->setDof((float)camera.fStop()*scale, (float)camera.focusDistance(), 0);
        } else {
                beastCamera->setDof(0.0f, 0.0f, 0);
        }
}

bool checkJobStatus(ILBJobStatus jobStatus) {
        switch (jobStatus) {
                case ILB_JS_SUCCESS:
                        return true;
                case ILB_JS_CANCELLED:
                        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('information', 'Job has been canceled.')");
                        return false;
                case ILB_JS_INVALID_LICENSE:
                        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('warning', 'A license error has occurred. Please check that your BEAST_LICENSE environment variable contains a valid license. Job has been canceled.')");
                        return false;
                case ILB_JS_CONFIG_ERROR:
                        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('warning', 'Unable to parse XML configuration file. Please check the log file for more information. Job has been canceled.')");
                        return false;
        }
        MGlobal::executePythonCommandOnIdle("beastUtils.messageBox('warning', 'Job execution has failed.')");
        return false;
}

#ifdef WIN32
std::basic_string<TCHAR> getLicenseKey() {
        std::basic_stringstream<TCHAR> result;
        char *tempVal;
        size_t length;
        errno_t error = _dupenv_s(&tempVal, &length, "BEAST_LICENSE");
        if (error == 0 && tempVal != NULL) {
                result << tempVal;
                free(tempVal);
        }
        return result.str();
}
#else
std::basic_string<TCHAR> getLicenseKey() {
        std::basic_stringstream<TCHAR> result;          
        char* temp = getenv("BEAST_LICENSE");
        if (temp != NULL) {
                result << temp;
        }
        return result.str();
}

#endif

void getFilterSettings(MFnDependencyNode& target, FilterSettings& direct, FilterSettings& indirect, FilterSettings& other) {
        // Starting with all filters disabled
        direct.size = indirect.size = other.size = 0.0f;
        bool enableDirectFilter, enableIndirectFilter, enableOtherFilter;
        getPlugValue(target, L"enableDirectFilter", enableDirectFilter);
        getPlugValue(target, L"enableIndirectFilter", enableIndirectFilter);
        getPlugValue(target, L"enableOtherFilter", enableOtherFilter);
        if(enableDirectFilter) {
                getPlugValue(target, L"directFilterSize", direct.size);
                getPlugValue(target, L"directFilterNormalDev", direct.normalDev);
        }
        if(enableIndirectFilter) {
                getPlugValue(target, L"indirectFilterSize", indirect.size);
                getPlugValue(target, L"indirectFilterNormalDev", indirect.normalDev);
        }
        if(enableOtherFilter) {
                getPlugValue(target, L"otherFilterSize", other.size);
                getPlugValue(target, L"otherFilterNormalDev", other.normalDev);
        }
}

float getErnstVarianceThreshold(ELiveNoiseReduction type) {
        switch(type) {
                case LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_NONE:
                        return 1000.0f;
                case LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_LOW:
                        return 0.0025f;
                case LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_MEDIUM:
                        return 0.001f;
                case LIVE_NOISE_REDUCTION_HIGH:
                default:
                        return 0.0001f;
        }
}
